title: CS136 Instructional Support Assistant
description: As an Instructional Support Assistant (ISA) for CS136/l at the University of Waterloo's Faculty of Mathematics during the COOP, I actively assisted instructors, facilitated student learning through tutorials and digital platforms, managed coursework marking, and upheld academic integrity by proctoring examinations, ensuring a supportive educational environment
quote: Facilitating academic success in CS136/l at UWaterloo.

sections.exp_description: Develop and implementation of course related script boost the speed of marking process and database communication
